room_title: Escape room "Al Capone's Speakeasy" by Escape History in Warren
room_description:
February 15, 1929. A day after the St. Valentine's Day Massacre, a bloody attack by Al Capone's crew on the men of Bugs Malone to eliminate the Italians. Bug's has hired your crew in order to get revenge on Capone and hit him where it will hurt him the most... his pocket.
First, you'll have to sneak into his private speakeasy, Room 21. Once in, you'll have to grab his business ledgers, steal his profits, and blow his joint up before anyone finds you out. Do all of this and take down the most notorious mob boss in the United States. Fail and you'll be sleeping with the fishes.
